mapper.select: SELECT T_CODE, (SELECT M_NAME FROM MEMBER WHERE M_CODE = TE.M_CODE) M_CODE, TR_REPLY, TR_DATE, TR_RATE, TR_NUM FROM TEMPLATE_REPLY_BOARD TE WHERE T_CODE = #{t_code} ORDER BY TR_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TEMPLATE_REPLY_BOARD VALUES( #{t_code}, (SELECT M_CODE FROM MEMBER WHERE M_NAME = #{m_code}), #{tr_reply}, sysdate, #{tr_rate}, SEQ_REPLY.NEXTVAL)
mapper.update: UPDATE TEMPLATE_REPLY_BOARD SET TR_REPLY = #{tr_reply} WHERE TR_NUM = #{tr_num}
